chapter.title: Webservices
chapter.para: This chapter introduces Savant's webservices to the developer. The framework supports differend kinds of webservices.

section.title: SOAP Webservices
section.para: This section describes SOAP Webservices and the way they are handled by Savant.

section.title: Architecture
section.para: The webservice architecture in Savant hides the complexity of SOAP Webservices from the developer. Annoying tasks like writing wsdl files are no longer necessary. The framework generates proxy objects called stubs automatically around both client and server objects.

section.title: Document/Literal Wrapped Style with Session Handling
section.para: The Savant\Webservice\CSoapServer class can be used to promote any business logic class with deterministic parameters to a SOAP webservice with automated security handling.
